questions.title: 常見問答
questions.description: 請讓我們知道這圖片是否回答了那些問題。

logos.title: 標誌
logos.description: 請找出與指定表章匹配的所有表章

green_score.title: Eco-score
green_score.description: Annotate the questions with the highest value

account_band.title: 想要讓您的貢獻有所價值嗎？在Open Food Facts上創建帳戶或登入吧！
account_band.contribution_details: 了解為何您的貢獻很重要

contribution_modal.title: 您的貢獻很重要
contribution_modal.information: 「飢餓遊戲」是我們運用OCR（光學字符識別）和人工智能的一項成果。當您使用Open Food Facts的「飢餓遊戲」時，您可以幫助我們改善整個資料庫，從而替社區做出更好的飲食選擇。我們將會收集您的註解，並將使用它們，以使Open Food Facts變得更加準確和高效。
contribution_modal.thank_you: 感謝您協助我們改進Open Food Facts，讓更多人能夠更輕鬆地使用它。

questions.label: 標籤
questions.an_error_occurred: An error occurred. Please reload, try later or contact the team.
questions.login_description: You are not currently logged into Open Food Facts. To get your answers directly applied to products, and associated to your account, consider logging in to your Open Food Facts account, or creating one
questions.please_wait_while_we_fetch_the_question: Please wait while we fetch the question!

logos.task_description: Select all logos that are exactly the same, and give them a name like "en:EU Organic" and a type like "label".
logos.label: 標籤
logos.no_more_questions: No more questions about this logo. You can try to find more logos with the following game.

loading_messages.pending_reference_logos: We are loading some logos examples to initialise the search
loading_messages.failed_reference_logos: We did not find any logos with this annotation. Try to use the following game to annotate some of them.

deep_search.title: Logo search
deep_search.description: Select a logo you want to look for, and let's go to catch them all. For every logo you annotate, we will fetch it's neighbors such that you might never stop to annotate. (Press Shift to select range of logos)
deep_search.ref_logos: Reference logos (logo already annotated with this value)

settings.reportIssue: Found a bug? Please let us know.
settings.dev_mode_title: To get more options, activate the dev mode
settings.text1: Open Food Facts is a collaborative project built by tens of thousands of volunteers and managed by a non-profit organization with 8 employees. We need your donations to fund the Open Food Facts 2024 budget and to continue to develop the project.
settings.text2: 來自全世界共同協作、自由且開放的食品資料庫。

page1.title: 歡迎來到《飢餓遊戲》
page1.text1: Hunger Games is a collection of mini-games that help contribute to Open Food Facts in many ways. You can play our really exciting games from anywhere. Here is a guided tour of the entire website which will get you started.
page1.text2: Make sure to login to the Open Food Facts website to get credit for your contributions. If you make a mistake, please take the time to correct it by heading to the website.
page1.text3: 如果對遊戲有任何疑問，請點擊頁面右上角的問號圖標，您可以通過 Slack 上的 #hunger-games 頻道聯繫我們。

page2.title: Questions Game
page2.text1: Does the food product belong to this brand?
page2.text2: Simply answer with a Yes/No! Don't know the answer? That's alright, just skip it.
page2.text3: You can also use your keyboard shortcuts: y,n and k.
page2.text4: You can filter the products based on country, brands, popularity and much more!
page2.text5: If you don't want to do this every single time, you can also save the filters by clicking on the star. Next time you come back, find the saved filters on the home page itself

page3.title: Logos Game
page3.text1: Another popular game is the logos game where you have to select all the logos you feel are the same.
page3.text2: As shown in the example, once you select all the similar logos, just type their value and select where it is a brand, a label or something else. It's that simple!

page4.title: Eco-Score Questions Game
page4.text1: Help us finish the remaining questions in the most high priority labels!
page4.text2: These cards are linked to labels used in the computation of the Eco-Score.
page4.text4: Eco-Score captures the total environmental footprint, making it easier for consumers to compare products and decide which is better for the environment.

page5.title: 設定
page5.text1: Set your preferred language, and report issues from our settings page.
page5.text2: If you're a developer, you can also explore our database content using our dev mode.

page6.title: Tour
page6.text1: Got stuck somewhere? Want to take the tour again?
page6.text2: Just click on the question mark and start the journey again!

page1.title: 選項
page1.text1: Select the crops of a same logo by clicking on them
page1.text2: Selected logos go to the top of the page, you can unselect them by clicking again on them

page2.title: 警告
page2.text1: If the crop contains multiple logos, do not select it.
page2.text2: If the crop contains only a partial part of a logo, you can select it.

page3.title: 驗證
page3.text1: Indicate the type of logo (label, brand, QRcode, ...)
page3.text2: If it is a label or a brand logo, indicate which one it is
page3.text3: Now you can submit your selection

instructions.title: How to use the interface
instructions.chose_between_empty_and_partially_filled: You can chose between products for which OpenFoodFacts (OFF) has no data about the nutrients. Or product with partially filled nutrient table.
instructions.indicate_not_provided_value: Empty inputs are ignored. If fibers are not present in the table, you can put "-" to specify the value is not available.
instructions.validate_one_column: Choose the size it is displayed in the picture. If you have 100g and serving size, please choose 100g because it's a normalized format.
instructions.skip_button: If you don't know how to deal with an image, or you just don't want to do it, press "skip". Other user will be able to handle it.
instructions.invalid_image_button: If the pictures is not a nutritional table, press "Invalid image" to remove it from the list of the images to verify

notfound.nopage: Whoops! The page you're looking for can't be found.

nutriscore.label: Annotate Nutri-Score logo detection by batch.
nutriscore.description: To do so, select all the images showing the correct/wrong Nutri-Score value ({{label}}), and click on the bottom buttons to say if you selected a set correct or wrong ones.

green-score.description: Here is a summary of questions that could improve Eco-Score computation

ingredients.description: This game allows you to validate the pre-selection of images of ingredients lists in various languages for a product, and validate the extracted ingredients.
